github_body:
General changes:
* #361 Some administrative tools related to Patreon have been added.

Map changes:
* #318 You can now re-order your pulls by simply dragging a pull around in the sidebar.
* #297 Improved the speed and responsiveness at which the 'Apply to pulls' gradient works.
* #314 Patrons can now create animated lines.
* #259 Added a bunch more icons to select for a map icon.

Bugfixes:
* #356 Trying a route while not logged no longer leads to 403 Unauthorized.
* #363 Trying a route while logged in no longer leads to 403 Unauthorized.
* #357 Deploying a new release would break Awakened obelisk gateway links; code was reworked and this was prevented.
* #364 Deleting a pull while actively adding enemies to it will no longer cause a broken map state, requiring a full refresh to fix.
* #365 De-selecting a pull when you have no editable objects will no longer enable the edit/delete buttons.
* #355 Various properties were not cloned properly when cloning a route (such as Teeming flag).

MDT importer changes:
* #367 Method Dungeon Tools references have been replaced with Mythic Dungeon Tools.
discord_body:
v3.1 (2020/07/01)(https://keystone.guru/release/v3.1)
General changes:
    * #361 Some administrative tools related to Patreon have been added.

Map changes:
    * #318 You can now re-order your pulls by simply dragging a pull around in the sidebar.
    * #297 Improved the speed and responsiveness at which the 'Apply to pulls' gradient works.
    * #314 Patrons can now create animated lines.
    * #259 Added a bunch more icons to select for a map icon.

Bugfixes:
    * #356 Trying a route while not logged no longer leads to 403 Unauthorized.
    * #363 Trying a route while logged in no longer leads to 403 Unauthorized.
    * #357 Deploying a new release would break Awakened obelisk gateway links; code was reworked and this was prevented.
    * #364 Deleting a pull while actively adding enemies to it will no longer cause a broken map state, requiring a full refresh to fix.
    * #365 De-selecting a pull when you have no editable objects will no longer enable the edit/delete buttons.
    * #355 Various properties were not cloned properly when cloning a route (such as Teeming flag).

MDT importer changes:
    * #367 Method Dungeon Tools references have been replaced with Mythic Dungeon Tools.
reddit_body:
[https://keystone.guru/release/v3.1](https://keystone.guru/release/v3.1)

General changes:
* [\#361](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/361) Some administrative tools related to Patreon have been added.

Map changes:
* [\#318](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/318) You can now re-order your pulls by simply dragging a pull around in the sidebar.
* [\#297](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/297) Improved the speed and responsiveness at which the 'Apply to pulls' gradient works.
* [\#314](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/314) Patrons can now create animated lines.
* [\#259](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/259) Added a bunch more icons to select for a map icon.

Bugfixes:
* [\#356](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/356) Trying a route while not logged no longer leads to 403 Unauthorized.
* [\#363](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/363) Trying a route while logged in no longer leads to 403 Unauthorized.
* [\#357](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/357) Deploying a new release would break Awakened obelisk gateway links; code was reworked and this was prevented.
* [\#364](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/364) Deleting a pull while actively adding enemies to it will no longer cause a broken map state, requiring a full refresh to fix.
* [\#365](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/365) De-selecting a pull when you have no editable objects will no longer enable the edit/delete buttons.
* [\#355](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/355) Various properties were not cloned properly when cloning a route (such as Teeming flag).

MDT importer changes:
* [\#367](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/367) Method Dungeon Tools references have been replaced with Mythic Dungeon Tools.

changes.change: Some administrative tools related to Patreon have been added.
You can now re-order your pulls by simply dragging a pull around in the sidebar.
Improved the speed and responsiveness at which the 'Apply to pulls' gradient works.
Patrons can now create animated lines.
Added a bunch more icons to select for a map icon.
Trying a route while not logged no longer leads to 403 Unauthorized.
Trying a route while logged in no longer leads to 403 Unauthorized.
Deploying a new release would break Awakened obelisk gateway links; code was reworked and this was prevented.
Deleting a pull while actively adding enemies to it will no longer cause a broken map state, requiring a full refresh to fix.
De-selecting a pull when you have no editable objects will no longer enable the edit/delete buttons.
Various properties were not cloned properly when cloning a route (such as Teeming flag).
Method Dungeon Tools references have been replaced with Mythic Dungeon Tools.
